name: Made in Haxe
description: A simple mod that adds a single item. Uses PickHaxe to support both Fabric and Forge!

name: Obsidian Armor
description: A mod for Fabric and Forge that adds a full armor and tool set. Includes a Creative Tab and custom advancement!

name: Made in Haxe (Bare: Fabric 1.20.2)
description: A simple mod that adds a single item. Written directly with the Fabric API for Minecraft 1.20.2.
